int cDeltaDevice::initialize ( const bool  a_resetEncoders = false  )  [virtual]

Calibrate delta device.

Calibrate delta device.

This function does nothing right now; the a_resetEncoders parameter is ignored.

Parameters:

Returns:
Always 0
